front.p:
From Lt.Lieutenant (Leutnant) Colonel Holland
President
of the Patent Tunneling & Mining Machine Co.Compagnia / Compagnie / Company (Gesellschaft)
Limited

To The President of the St.Sankt / Sanct / Saint (heilig) Gothard Railway Company
Dr Doktor / Doctor A. Escher
Direction St.Sankt / Sanct / Saint (heilig) Gothard
Bellevue
Lucerne
Suisse

body.p:
I beg to forward for the consideration of your Board
a Tender from the Company of which I am President
for the excavation of the Great St. Gothard Tunnel.

I shall be happy to supply you or any of your
Directors, or the Engineer in Chief of the St.Sankt / Sanct / Saint (heilig) Gothard Railway
Company with any further information required regarding
the terms on which my Company tenders for the work
to be performed, or with reference to the Machine employed
by my Company.

I would mention that the eminent firm of Messrs Messieurs (Herren)
John Fowler & Co Compagnia / Compagnie / Company (Gesellschaft) of Leeds are co-operating with my Company
and construct our Machines for us.

As soon as your Directors are able to decide
on the acceptance or refusal of the enclosed Tender I
shall feel obliged by your communication with me at the
above address.

I hoped to have been able to have sent you with
the accompanying Tender an extract from the Memoirs of
the Society of Civil Engineers published at Paris in March
1868 which fully describes this Company's Machine at that
date; I have however not yet receivedx since received and sent you today the copies of thisesic!
ordered and must therefore postpone sending you this for
the present: as soon as I am able I shall forward you
a copy, in the meantime I send you by Book post
the volume in which the above extract was published,
